name: Alien Target
overview: Alien Target is a first person side-scrolling shooter. The player assumes the role of an alien hunter. Using a machine invented by Professor Jack L. Chalker he is teleported to ancient times and starts the fight against hostile invaders to save the planet. The game takes place on a single side-scrolling location. The player's task is to track down and kill all the enemies without losing all energy and hitting the citizens. A new enemy appears every few seconds in the place indicated on the scanner. The player moves viewfinder to the right, left, up or down. Machine gun ammo, grenades and energy can be supplemented by appearing on the board power-ups. The game offers a total of four stages (Ancient, XIX Century, Present, Future), separated by a bonus mini-levels - destruction of time explosives.
